definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_haspotioneffect"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Smclzf</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="world_data_isremote"/></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.03</field></block></value></block></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">CUSTOM:Chiwuwuli</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
